welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Shanklin, UK! Get ready to experience the stunning beaches, charming village atmosphere, and rich history that this coastal gem is known for. Enjoy your stay and immerse yourself in all that Shanklin has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Bembridge Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Southampton Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Goodwood Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Goodwood Airport offers exclusive services for private jet owners and passengers.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Bournemouth International Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Bournemouth International Airport is responsible for handling all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
